meanings.definition: A drug used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cholestyramine to reduce my cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Many people take cholestyramine to help with their cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: I joked that cholestyramine was like a superhero fighting bad cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: Cholestyramine acts like a sponge soaking up excess cholesterol in the body.
meanings.sent5: The image of cholestyramine battling cholesterol stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A medication that binds to bile acids in the intestine to help remove cholesterol from the body.
meanings.sent1: After taking cholestyramine, the bile acids were removed from my body.
meanings.sent2: Cholestyramine helps by binding to bile acids and removing cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: I imagined cholestyramine as a tiny cleaner inside my intestines, scrubbing away cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: Using cholestyramine is like having a helpful friend who takes out the trash (cholesterol).
meanings.sent5: The way cholestyramine works to remove cholesterol is fascinating.
